statements: SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor, class_time FROM course_schedule WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor FROM course_schedule ORDER BY course_name ASC, instructor DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE class_time BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT course_id, instructor, capacity FROM course_schedule WHERE availability = TRUE AND capacity > 20;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE capacity > 20 ORDER BY class_time DESC
SELECT course_name, instructor, class_time FROM course_schedule WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY course_name ASC, class_time DESC
SELECT course_id, instructor, capacity FROM course_schedule WHERE class_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY course_id
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE capacity < 10 AND availability = TRUE ORDER BY instructor
SELECT course_name, capacity FROM course_schedule WHERE instructor LIKE 'Dr.%'
SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule;
SELECT * FROM availability WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT instructor_name, available_days FROM availability;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, time_slot FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 1 AND instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_name, time_slot FROM course_schedule WHERE instructor_name = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name, time_slot FROM course_schedule WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT * FROM course_schedule ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, COUNT(course_id) AS num_courses FROM course_schedule GROUP BY instructor_name HAVING num_courses > 5;
SELECT * FROM course WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_name, email FROM student WHERE enrollment_status = 'enrolled';
SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time FROM course ORDER BY start_time;
SELECT student_name, email FROM student ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM course WHERE start_time > '09:00:00';
SELECT * FROM course WHERE instructor = 'John Doe' ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time FROM course WHERE start_time >= '10:00:00' AND end_time <= '14:00:00';
SELECT student_name, email FROM student WHERE enrollment_status = 'Active' ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_id, student_id, day_of_week FROM schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' AND start_time < '12:00:00';

SELECT course.course_name, student.student_name, schedule.day_of_week FROM course JOIN schedule ON course.course_id = schedule.course_id JOIN student ON schedule.student_id = student.student_id ORDER BY course.course_name ASC, schedule.day_of_week DESC;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY course_name ASC
SELECT course_id, instructor FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT * FROM CourseAvailability WHERE available_seats > 5
SELECT location, available_seats FROM CourseAvailability WHERE course_id = 3 ORDER BY available_seats DESC
SELECT instructor_name, contact_number FROM InstructorAvailability
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule_date FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CourseAvailability WHERE location = 'New York' AND available_seats > 10;
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name, contact_number FROM InstructorAvailability ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT room_name, room_capacity, available_days FROM RoomAvailability WHERE room_capacity >= 20 ORDER BY room_capacity DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule_date FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT course_name, schedule_day, schedule_time FROM courses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM courses
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, schedule_day FROM courses WHERE schedule_day = 'Monday'
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM courses JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_name = instructors.instructor_name
SELECT course_name, schedule_day, schedule_time FROM courses JOIN schedules ON courses.course_id = schedules.course_id WHERE schedule_day = 'Friday' ORDER BY schedule_time DESC
